title: What’s a good way to get even with a my next door neighbor who plays loud music? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you haven’t tried to talk to them about it yet, do that first. If you have, don’t try to get even with someone that lives close to you. Things can and more than likely will escalate and someone will get hurt. That being said, if you’ve exhausted every avenue of taking care of it yourself, if they rent find out who the landlord is and give them a call. If they own it themselves, put in an anonymous noise complaint to the police department.
Buy a drum kit and learn how to play. Practice for a couple of hours a day. Play along to music as often as you can using speakers.
